Chapter.Label: Chapter_Reading_and_Writing_Local_Action_Diagrams_To_Files
Chapter.Heading: Reading and Writing Local Action Diagrams To Files
Chapter.Section:
Reading and Writing Local Action Diagrams To Files
Local action diagrams made in GAP can be written to a file. They can also be read from the file into GAP. The format of these files are as follows:
<Digraph String> <Vertex Labels> <Edge Labels> <Edge Reversal Map> <List of Other Attributes>
Multiple local action diagrams can be stored in the same file.
